description:
Triton of the Sea meets Astro, who`s looking for beach babes. Gold Lightan is outdone by silver burners. Magma Ambassador and Gold Lightan discuss ramen. Da Roomda!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Triton of the Sea on Guard at the Beach / Good Buy Shopping / Newlyweds Buy a Cheap Cleaning Robot / Gold Lightan and Magma`s Sentimental Journey: Nakasu
Umi no Triton: Beach de Kanshichuu / Good Buy Shopping (Gas Burner Hen) / Shinkon-chan: Kakuyasu Robot Soujiki o Kau / Raitan to Magma no Junjou Otoko Tabi: Nakasu Hen
海のトリトン ビーチで監視中 / グッバイ・ショッピング (ガスバーナー編) / 新婚ちゃん 格安ロボット掃除機を買う / ライタンとマグマの純情男旅 中州編
